          faq/** widget/ widget/news For widget/news >>> deps blog/** So /blog or /blog/xxxx or /blog/xxxx/comment-4 would return widget/news blog/** -> [widget/news, templates/homepage] blog/ -> [widget/news, templates/homepage] // imaginary entry/.. blog -> []

        • java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDependencyPathsOf(WcmContent content, java.lang.Boolean recurse = false)

          Get the list of string node paths that the specified node explicitly depends on, as well as any special implicit dependencies e.g. Template. This does not recurse, it gather the info for this node only, unless you pass in "true" for "recurse"

        • void recurseDependencyPathsOf(WcmContent content, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> results, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> alreadyVisited)
